sentences.en: All the schools have music and dancing as part of the curriculum.
sentences.cn: 所有学校都设有音乐和舞蹈课。

sentences.en: Every time they went dancing they ended up in a bad mood.
sentences.cn: 每次他们去跳舞，都会不欢而散。

sentences.en: Her dancing brought loud cheers, wolf whistles and applause.
sentences.cn: 她的舞蹈赢来震耳的欢呼声、口哨声和掌声。

sentences.en: Her hobbies include music, dancing, sport and cooking.
sentences.cn: 她的爱好包括音乐、舞蹈、体育和烹饪。

sentences.en: I felt sure I'd have to kiss my dancing career goodbye.
sentences.cn: 我明确感觉到我将不得不与我的舞蹈生涯说再见了。

sentences.en: I like dancing, singing and drawing.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢跳舞、唱歌和画画。

sentences.en: She begins dancing, kicking her legs high in the air.
sentences.cn: 她开始跳舞，做了空中高踢腿动作。

sentences.en: She could not hide her amusement at the way he was dancing.
sentences.cn: 她见他跳舞的姿势，忍俊不禁。

sentences.en: She tended to finish dancing with a flourish.
sentences.cn: 她往往以夸张的姿势结束舞蹈。

sentences.en: The children pretend to be different animals dancing to the music.
sentences.cn: 孩子们扮成不同的动物，随着音乐起舞。

sentences.en: The dancing is uninhibited and as frenzied as an aerobics class.
sentences.cn: 舞跳得非常奔放，就像在做有氧健身操一样疯狂。

sentences.en: The feasting, drinking, dancing and revelry continued for several days.
sentences.cn: 一连几天都是宴会、痛饮、舞蹈和狂欢。

sentences.en: There is a ceremony of prayer and flagellation before the dancing begins.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈开始前会举行祈祷和鞭笞的仪式。

words.tran_cn: 舞蹈家；舞蹈演员；舞女；跳舞者

phrases.tran_cn: 舞女（以伴人跳舞为业的女人）

trans.tran_cn: 舞蹈，舞步，舞蹈艺术，舞会，舞曲

trans.tran_en: When people dance for enjoyment or to entertain others, you can refer to this activity as dancing

trans.tran_cn: 跳舞，雀跃，闪亮，闪动，dance的现在分词
